attributes.action: ensure that no forthcoming Labour Leader can automatically become Prime Minister without a mandate from the British people ie General Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is much wrong with our outdated political system. Nothing more so than when a Prime Minister leaves office mid term. Gordon Brown (or any other candidate for the Labour Leadership) must NOT take over the top job without the mandate of the British people.
